text: Ridgeview is an unincorporated community in Peru Township, Miami County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is located within the city limits of Peru. ==History== Ridgeview used to be an incorporated town at one point in its history before being annexed to the city of Peru. ==Geography== Ridgeview is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Miami County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
